name: The Wizard's Scroll
description:
Play as Fire Wizard and find the Magic Scroll in the ancient dungeon. Defeat the evil that live there!

A and D or Arrows - Move

Space or Up Arrow - Jump

LMB or Q - Small Fireball

Hold LMB or Q - Prepare Big Fireball

RMB or E - Big Fireball Immediately For 30 Crystals

M - Menu

Music during Boss fight - Air Sharks https://www.playonloop.com/2012-music-loops/air-sharks/
